channel.title: [317] Donater Help!
channel.description:
Greetings earthlings, After relising that I want some money, i thought i donater rank would help!
[u]What I have done so far[/u] I have got a paypal donate widget on my website!
[u]What I want[/u] I want a new playerrights = 5 for donater,
I want a new a login name for donater, Donater (playername) has logged in w00t!! (what file would i find this in?)
Thanks guys,
Every help is appreciated, Thanks Ronald :D:D

item.title: [317] Donater Help!
item.dc:creator: @Tree_Climber Tree_Climber
item.description:
@Tree_Climber wrote:

What not just use a members variable.
Then client already reads a value saying if the player is a member or not, why not just use that?

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Donater Help!
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

[quote=“blood5, post:4, topic:292859”]here

else if (playerRights == 5)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Donater." +playerName+ " has logged in";
}
[/code][/quote]


Or.
[code]else if (playerRights == 5)
{
yell("Donater "+playerName+" has logged in");
}

Read full topic
